text: is a Japanese footballer who plays for Kagoshima United FC. ==Career== After being picked as captain for his University football team, Fujisawa was signed by JFL-team Sagawa Shiga FC. He even had a brief stint in 5th German football division with SC Viktoria 06 Griesheim, but he was released after few months.
